titles.title: America's Partnership for Nursing Education Act of 2007
To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants to increase the number of qualified nursing faculty, and for other purposes.
America's Partnership for Nursing Education Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: America's Partnership for Nursing Education Act of 2007 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to states that are experiencing explosive population growth and have a substantial projected shortage of nurses to increase the number of qualified nursing faculty in college and university nursing programs in the state.
